Verses: 1 kadaisiyaaga, Sagodharare, Ungalidaththil Karththarudaiya Vasanam Parambi Magimaippadugiradhupola, Evvidaththilum Parambi Magimaippadumpadikkum,
2 dhurkkunaraagiya Pollaadha Manushar Kaiyinindru Naangal Viduvikkappadumpadikkum, Engalukkaaga Vendikkollungal; Visuvaasam Ellaaridaththilumillaiye.
3 karththaro Unmaiyullavar, Avar Ungalai Sthirappaduththi, Theemaiyinindru Vilakkik Kaaththukkolluvaar.
4 melum, Naangal Kattalaiyidugiravaigalai Neengal Seydhuvarugireergalendrum, Inimelum Seyveergalendrum, Ungalaikkuriththuk Karththarukkul Nambikkaiyaayirukkirom.
5 karththar Ungal Irudhayangalai Dhevanaippatrum Anbukkum Kiristhuvin Porumaikkum Neraai Nadaththuvaaraaga.

6 melum, Sagodharare, Engalidaththil Etrukkonda Muraimaiyinpadi Nadavaamal, Ozhungatru Nadakkira Endha Sagodhararaiyum Neengal Vittu Vilagavendumendru, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiyayesukiristhuvin Naamaththile, Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyidugirom.
7 innavidhamaai Engalaip Pinpatravendumendru Neengal Arindhirukkireergale; Naangal Ungalukkulle Ozhungatru Nadavaamalum,
8 oruvanidaththilum Ilavasamaai Saappidaamalum, Ungalil Oruvanukkum Baaramaayiraadhapadikku Iravum Pagalum Pirayaasaththodum Varuththaththodum Velaiseydhu Saappittom.
9 ungalmel Baaraththai Vaippadharkaana Adhigaaram Engalukku Illaiyenbadhinaale Appadi Seyyaamal, Neengal Engalaip Pinbatrumpadikku Naangal Ungalukku Maadhiriyaayirukkavendumendre Appadi Seydhom.
10 oruvan Velaiseyya Manadhillaadhirundhaal Avan Saappidavum Koodaadhendru Naangal Ungalidaththil Irundhapodhu Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyittome.
11 ungalil Silar Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyaamal, Veen Aluvarkaararaai, Ozhungatruth Thirigiraargalendru Kelvippadugirom.
12 ippadippattavargal Amaidhalode Velaiseydhu, Thangal Sondha Saappaattaich Saappidavendumendru, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaale Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittup Buththisollugirom.
14 melum, Indha Nirubaththil Solliya Engal Vasanaththukku Oruvan Keezhppadiyaamarponaal, Avanaik Kuriththukkondu, Avan Vetkappadumpadikku Avanudane Kalavaadhirungal.
15 aanaalum Avanai Saththuruvaaga Ennaamal, Sagodharanaaga Enni, Avanukkup Buththisollungal.
16 samaadhaanaththin Karththardhaame Eppozhudhum Sagalavidhaththilum Ungalukku Samaadhaanaththaith Thandharuluvaaraaga. Karththar Ungalanaivarodunkooda Iruppaaraaga.
17 pavulaagiya Naan En Kaiyezhuththaale Ungalai Vaazhththugiren, Nirubangaldhorum Idhuve Adaiyaalam; Ippadiye Ezhudhugiren.
18 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Kirubai Ungalanaivarodunkooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
